questions.stem: Which of the following statements correctly describes Newton's second law of motion?
options: A) Force equals mass times acceleration.
B) Acceleration equals force divided by time.
C) Energy equals work multiplied by power.
D) Power equals energy divided by time.
questions.rationale: Newton's second law of motion states that the acceleration of an object is directly proportional to the net force acting on it and inversely proportional to its mass.
